summary: This is an internal email from August 12, 2019, regarding the timeline of Jeffrey Epstein's arrival and initial housing at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in July 2019. It details his movement from general population to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and Psychology Observation, clarifying that the latter was not a suicide watch.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email, detailing his arrival and housing status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in July 2019.

events.title: Epstein arrives at MCC
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein arrived at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York and was placed in the Receiving and Discharge area. He was moved to general population as staff were unaware he was a high-profile inmate.

events.title: Moved to Special Housing Unit
events.description: The Warden identified Epstein as high-profile and moved him to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) due to concerns for his personal safety in general population.

events.title: Placed in Psychology Observation
events.description: Epstein was moved to Psychology Observation for evaluation by Psychology Service Staff. The email clarifies this was NOT a suicide watch, and he was under 24-hour observation to assess readiness for SHU.

events.title: Returned to SHU with cellmate
events.description: Epstein was returned to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) with a cellmate, where he remained until July 23.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein arrived at the MCC on July 6, 2019, and was initially placed in general population because staff were unaware he was a high-profile inmate.
On July 7, the Warden moved Epstein to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) due to safety concerns.
On July 8, Epstein was placed in Psychology Observation for evaluation, which the email explicitly states was NOT a suicide watch.
Epstein was returned to the SHU with a cellmate on July 10 and remained there until July 23, 2019.
